name: Struggle Bug
description: You resist an attack, fighting back against a creature. When hit by a melee attack, you may use a reaction to immediately retaliate with an attack roll of your own, dealing 1d6 + MOVE bug damage on a hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.

contest.effect: Works great if the user goes last this turn.
